name: forever dull
description: in 2017 I began a project journaling my internal thoughts on a daily basis. confrontational and profane, it was at the same time brutally honest. use of language has become integral to my work, just as sometimes jarring confrontation has become a method of engagement. 'forever dull' is a statement on our search for meaning and fulfillment, paradoxically within the spaces we are least likely to find it. 'forever dull' (2021) | Brendan Conrad Forde | @acid_very
